name: Lobo em pele de Cordeiro
description:
Title: Wolf in lamb skin

Main Character: Wolf

Objective: Hunt the sheep in the Pasture to avoid being caught by the Sheepdog.

You can dress up as a Sheep by pressing the T Key, so you won't get caught by the Dog.

Be Quick, or you will be killed by your Hunger or you will be caught by the Hound.

Engine Used: Unreal Engine 5

Game/Level Desinger: Teo Tortato

Programming Blueprints/Animation: Evandro Ripka

Artificial Intelligence: João Moreira
